---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/polkadot/transfer/get-flow-status-transferred
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/7d022b7b-b509-4abc-94f1-e1e16c32b0bc' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `transfer_tx_broadcasting` to `transferred`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {4}
{
  "id": "7d022b7b-b509-4abc-94f1-e1e16c32b0bc",
  "operation": "transfer",
  "state": "transferred",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "from_account_address": "5E1VnXHKaKVYrq9wjNj6RKHNn8VpMfKRar9RAXEdKxKfTeV6",
    "to_account_address": "5FNVfA6qhVJBKrG4KCo6CLzvcXVRRdiGpsYHbkzujMUG6JJG",
    "amount": "1.0",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "0x04000092460dcf0b9ae6cabf654c1b33f02f52934d1ae262f8db733b470b631c587165070010a5d4e8000800a424000013000000e143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423ee143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423e",
      "signed": "0x3d0284005606182f1a01b77f9914856c907ddf4279018e96537be51c2d29834d93dfdf7a01eecedc5d94f01d7ee336be33dcad5cc37c3f734a2806ec7ca2620fe5643c1856ff9e15ae8f23d078605aad930f441912b320a314dc53ebdba7a655580549ff8300080004000092460dcf0b9ae6cabf654c1b33f02f52934d1ae262f8db733b470b631c587165070010a5d4e8",
      "hash": "0x82664a2937586c2f072d4fecb05d28e64ea4b530d63a4dca97fe5b962f5ae5a2",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_time": "2023-02-28T19:50:00.308Z",
      "block_number": 14838671,
      "proxy": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "polkadot",
  "chain_code": "westend",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T19:41:47.212Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-28T19:50:00.316Z"
}
```

### Token Transfer Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully transferred your tokens!
